promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special rabbit fighting-type pokemon holding a regal mace. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maceroyale, a a gigantic special rabbit fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Sand Sonic. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "fighting" or "Maceroyale". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, rabbit-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Regarded as a royal gladiator, this colossal leporid thrives in arena-like habitats, mastering Sand Sonic abilities to outwit foes.
